mil7.8.3:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘chattassa tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamāni tāni tīṇi aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
mil7.8.3:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena kilesānaṃ upari muddhani carena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.8.3:5.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, chattassa paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.8.3:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, chattaṃ muddhanupatthambhaṃ hoti;
mil7.8.3:6.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena yoniso manasikārupatthambhena bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.8.3:6.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, chattassa dutiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
mil7.8.3:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, mahārāja, chattaṃ vātātapameghavuṭṭhiyo paṭihanati;
mil7.8.3:7.2: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena nānāvidhadiṭṭhiputhusamaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ matavāta-tividhaggisantāpakilesavuṭṭhiyo paṭihantabbā.
mil7.8.3:7.3: Idaṃ, mahārāja, chattassa tatiyaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
